alert.note: Alert for Huron; Richland; Seneca (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 7:29PM EDT until July 20 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN RICHLAND...SOUTHERN HURON...SOUTHEASTERN SENECA... NORTHERN ASHLAND...WYANDOT AND CRAWFORD COUNTIES... At 729 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Norwalk to near Sycamore, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Bucyrus, Upper Sandusky, Galion, Shelby, Willard, Ontario, Crestline, New London, Plymouth, Forest, New Washington, Bloomville, Sycamore, Savannah, Morral, Chatfield, Marseilles, Carey and Sullivan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
